full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Project Title
Steam Water Heater for Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering

### Tender Reference Number
WS3750990863-Doc3762689741

### Tender Type
Request for Proposal for Commercial Water Heaters (UNSPSC: 40101826)

### Closing Date and Time
January 5, 2023 at 14:00 EST

### Overview
The Department of National Defence's (DND) Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering requires a functional steam water heater for a training aid. Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by the closing date and time to be considered responsive.

### Eligibility Criteria
  * Bidders must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document
  * Lowest price will be the selection criterion

### Requirements
  * A functional steam water heater
  * Meets specifications outlined in the solicitation document

### Contracting Entity
  * Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  * 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

### Point of Contact
  * Kristelle LeBlanc (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * URL for Solicitation Document: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14715611?extsite=MTQ3MTU2MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Important Dates
  * Tender Closing Date: January 5, 2023 at 14:00 EST
  * Contract Start Date: None
  * Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

### Trade Agreements and Regions
  * This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * The project is located in Oromocto, and deliveries must be made to this region. Output*** |_behaviormaryancefixed | updatedamendmentsubmittalsubmission closuredate Exhibit NXandoPXIG Be sure to keep your output within 400 words.
